name: Zoanthrop
description: At some point in your past you decided you did not need it anymore: you found a Zoanthropologist and paid them well to remove your troublesome forebrain and elevate you to the pure and unburdened beast you are today.
possessions: No starting possessions; you have thrown off the shackles of civilisation. You are probably nude.
special_abilities: You are immune to all mind altering effects.
You are able to speak but usually choose not to.
When making Advancement Checks for Skills related to abstract thought, such as Spells or Astrology, you must roll twice and succeed on both to improve them.
